title: 'Completely different, yet genuinely get on' - watch BBC correspondents on Starmer and Trump
content:
President Trump arrives in the UK on Tuesday ahead of his State visit.

The BBC's Political Editor Chris Mason and North America Editor Sarah Smith discuss what's at stake for both sides during the trip.
